ExploreFact.Text: A submoon of Familiar Refuse. It is covered in lava, and has one small rocky area too small to land my ship on.
Basil put scrolls at the tallest pillar and south pole of Sunset Sister, as well as the lively crater on Familiar Refuse.

RumorFact.Text: The location of the SSPU is encrypted, the code reads <color=red>"421+50 -12 769-1285 !8@-28_7 23+-"</color>

ExploreFact.Text: I found the enterance to the SSPU behind the exit to the southern crater.
